About Me

I'm Abhinav Chadaga (KingChad), a 17 year old producer, mix engineer, and musician, based in Flower Mound, Texas. I'm a part of the rap trio INDIGOS and I produce, mix, and occasionally perform with the band. My producing style varies with each song I craft, but I generally like to blend elements from trap, R&B, and old-school hip hop to create energetic and unique compositions.

While I've only been producing and mixing music for a year, my background in music is extensive. My beginning as a classically trained pianist and orchestral violinist for over eight years consistently shapes my work and drives me to create perfection. My passion for music runs deep, and together we can create the next big hit.

While you're here, feel free to browse my released work. If you would like to contact me to start a project, contact me

Services

I offer a variety of services and products to fit your audio needs at a price that won't break the bank.

Vocal Tracking

If you need a good place to track vocals, I offer a treated vocal booth featuring an Audio Technica AT-2035 condenser mic that feeds into a 3rd gen Focusrite Scarlett Solo. If you have your own mic that you prefer and are looking for an acoustically treated place to record and an engineer/producer for creative input, feel free to bring your own mic to the studio.

Mixing & Mastering

I mix in the box using the latest software plugins and analog emulations to achieve a crisp, full sounding mix. My tracking and mixing software of choice is Pro Tools which I use to edit and comp vocal takes, balance drums and instruments, and mix vocals using premium equalizers and compression emulations, all in order to bring out the best qualities of your song. I utilize plugins from vendors like Waves, Slate Digital, Plugin Alliance, and more to achieve the right sound for your mix.

Beats and Production

Check out my store for a variety of beats from genres like hip-hop, trap, R&B, and pop. Every beat is the result of precise sound selection mixed with quality melodies and crisp mixing. All my beats are mixed to perfection and ready to go for your latest project whether you purchase the 2 track beat or full multitracks.

Pricing

Here are my standard prices. Contact me with your budget and I'll do my best to work with you.

Vocal Tracking

Standard - $15 per hour ($40 for 3 hours)

Bring your own Mic - $10 per hour

Mixing

w/ .wav or .mp3 & vocals - $35

w/ instrumental stems & vocals - $60

Revisions

7 revisions free

$5 per revision after

Mastering

$25




The Studio is strictly NON-smoking!

outta the blue

INDIGOS

This is the debut studio album from the INDIGOS. I executive produced the album and mixed and mastered it myself. This was the first full length album I worked on and contains my first 10 beats. My producing and mixing skills have only grown and developed since this was released in September, 2019.
